subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Matt Reynolds had a .340 batting average as the starting shortstop for the Mets’ Class AAA team entering Tuesday, emerging as a potential answer at the position for the big league club in 2015.
snippet: Matt Reynolds had a .340 batting average as the starting shortstop for the Mets’ Class AAA team entering Tuesday, emerging as a potential answer at the position for the big league club in 2015.
